body:
Bazel is intended for hermetic builds and when setting up the workspace for the first time, it will download required external dependencies at the precise state it wants. For example, at this time, tensorflow uses protobuf with a specific fix (see [`workspace.bzl`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/c20da14/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L101)

Long story short, when setting up the workspace for the first time (or after a `bazel clean`), a network access is required.
